main_definition: Twenty is a numerical term representing the quantity or value of 20 units, commonly used as an ordinal number to indicate the position in a sequence.

meanings_and_examples.example: She came in twentieth place in the race.
He just turned twenty years old last month.
The price of the product increased by twenty cents.
There are 20 items in this batch for quality control purposes.
The distance she ran was twenty miles.
